title: Two little frosts
brief_description: An animated story in the style of a folk tale in which man is pitted against the elements. The personified frost creatures assume that an old man will fall easily prey to their ability to freeze. Despite all their efforts, the experienced woodman unknowingly defeats the two little frosts.
